name: RERA Projects Data Scraper
tagline: An automated web scraper for real estate project data.
overview: A Python-based automation tool that scrapes project details from the Odisha RERA (Real Estate Regulatory Authority) website using Selenium WebDriver. The script extracts key project and promoter details and saves them into a structured CSV file, making it easy to analyze or integrate into other systems.
features: Fetches project name, registration number, promoter details, address, and GST number.
Automatically saves scraped data into a CSV file for further analysis.
Uses WebDriverWait and error handling to manage dynamic page loads and unexpected popups.
Clicks through project detail pages and extracts promoter information before returning to the main list.

challenges.solution: Implemented WebDriverWait with specific XPaths to handle async loading.
Script detects and clicks 'Accept/Close' buttons automatically.
Added error handling & fallback defaults ('Not Found') for missing fields.
